snippet: French judges opened a formal investigation on Monday into four men suspected of links to jihadist activities in Syria, the office of the Paris prosecutor said.
lead_paragraph: French judges opened a formal investigation on Monday into four men suspected of links to jihadist activities in Syria, the office of the Paris prosecutor said.

headline.main: France: Four Charged With Ties to Syrian Jihadists
